cause.description:
To help raise awareness about Autism and what you can do to help out to support those in need! Create an understanding of what Autism is...what types there are...and the treatments and support that are out there!
1. A complex neurobiological developmental disorder that lasts throughout a person's lifetime, Autism affects one in every 150 children, with a child diagnosed every 21 minutes. Today, there is no known cause or cure.
cause.mission: Help find a cure for this epidemic!
cause.name: Autism Awareness
